00010 #if !defined(Apoxi_SvgPlayerDebug_hpp)
00011 #define Apoxi_SvgPlayerDebug_hpp
00015 
00016 #include "SvgConfig.hpp"
00017 
00018 #define SVG_DBG_SECTION_DECODER     0x00000001
00019 #define SVG_DBG_SECTION_CALLBACK    0x00000002
00020 #define SVG_DBG_SECTION_PLAYER      0x00000004
00021 #define SVG_DBG_SECTION_IMAGE       0x00000008
00022 #define SVG_DBG_SECTION_FILEWRAPPER 0x00000010
00023 #define SVG_DBG_SECTION_MEMORY      0x00000020
00024 #define SVG_DBG_SECTION_MEMORY_PROF 0x00000040
00025 #define SVG_DBG_SECTION_MIME        0x00000080
00026 #define SVG_DBG_SECTION_TEST        0x00000100
00027 #define SVG_DBG_SECTION_FIXPOINT    0x00000200
00028 #define SVG_DBG_SECTION_GZ          0x00000400
00029 #define SVG_DBG_SECTION_SYSFONTS    0x00000800
00030 
00031 #ifdef SVG_DEBUG
00032 
00033 #define SVG_DBG_USED_SECTIONS (SVG_DBG_SECTION_TEST | SVG_DBG_SECTION_IMAGE | SVG_DBG_SECTION_DECODER | SVG_DBG_SECTION_CALLBACK | SVG_DBG_SECTION_MEMORY_PROF)
00034 #define SVG_DBG_SECTIONS_USE_ALL 0
00035 
00036 #define SVG_DBG_OUT(SECTION, DATA) \
00037     if((SECTION & SVG_DBG_USED_SECTIONS) || SVG_DBG_SECTIONS_USE_ALL){ \
00038         DBG_OUT(DATA); \
00039     }
00040 
00041 #define SVG_ASSERT(COND) \
00042     if(!(COND)){ \
00043         DBG_OUT((0, "ASSERTION \"" #COND "\" FAILED AT: \"%s:%d\"\n", __FILE__, __LINE__)); \
00044     }
00045 
00046 #define SVG_PRINT_IMAGE_ERROR(ERROR_CODE) \
00047     switch(ERROR_CODE) \
00048     { \
00049         case Image::NoError: \
00050             SVG_DBG_OUT(SVG_DBG_SECTION_DECODER, (0, "*** SVGPLAYER::Callback_OpenStream() : Jpeg init error: NoError\n")); \
00051             break; \
00052         case Image::UnspecifiedError: \
00053             SVG_DBG_OUT(SVG_DBG_SECTION_DECODER, (0, "*** SVGPLAYER::Callback_OpenStream() : Jpeg init error: UnspecifiedError\n")); \
00054             break; \
00055         case Image::InvalidSizeError: \
00056             SVG_DBG_OUT(SVG_DBG_SECTION_DECODER, (0, "*** SVGPLAYER::Callback_OpenStream() : Jpeg init error: InvalidSizeError\n")); \
00057             break; \
00058         case Image::InitializationError: \
00059             SVG_DBG_OUT(SVG_DBG_SECTION_DECODER, (0, "*** SVGPLAYER::Callback_OpenStream() : Jpeg init error: InitializationError\n")); \
00060             break; \
00061         case Image::ScanlineBufferError: \
00062             SVG_DBG_OUT(SVG_DBG_SECTION_DECODER, (0, "*** SVGPLAYER::Callback_OpenStream() : Jpeg init error: ScanLineBufferError\n")); \
00063             break; \
00064         case Image::MissingDataError: \
00065             SVG_DBG_OUT(SVG_DBG_SECTION_DECODER, (0, "*** SVGPLAYER::Callback_OpenStream() : Jpeg init error: MissingDataError\n")); \
00066             break; \
00067         case Image::IsCurrentlyDecodedError: \
00068             SVG_DBG_OUT(SVG_DBG_SECTION_DECODER, (0, "*** SVGPLAYER::Callback_OpenStream() : Jpeg init error: IsCurrently>DecodedError\n")); \
00069             break; \
00070         case Image::CouldNotAllocateThreadletError: \
00071             SVG_DBG_OUT(SVG_DBG_SECTION_DECODER, (0, "*** SVGPLAYER::Callback_OpenStream() : Jpeg init error: CouldNotAllocateThreadletError\n")); \
00072             break; \
00073         case Image::ThreadletStoppedError: \
00074             SVG_DBG_OUT(SVG_DBG_SECTION_DECODER, (0, "*** SVGPLAYER::Callback_OpenStream() : Jpeg init error: ThreadletStoppedError\n")); \
00075             break; \
00076         case Image::OutOfMemoryError: \
00077             SVG_DBG_OUT(SVG_DBG_SECTION_DECODER, (0, "*** SVGPLAYER::Callback_OpenStream() : Jpeg init error: OutOfMemory\n")); \
00078             break; \
00079         default: \
00080             break; \
00081     }
00082 
00083 
00084 #else 
00085 
00088 #define SVG_DBG_OUT(SECTION, DATA) 
00089 #define SVG_ASSERT(COND)
00090 #define SVG_PRINT_IMAGE_ERROR(ERROR_CODE)
00091 
00092 #endif // SVG_DEBUG
